q: Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude.
h:
“Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.
h:
“To be fully alive, fully human, and completely awake is to be continually thrown out of the nest.” —
Pema Chodron

q: People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.
h:
“People are not disturbed by things, but by the views they take of them.” —
Epictetus

q: The time is now, the place is here. Stay in the present.
h:
“The time is now, the place is here. Stay in the present.” —
Dan Millman

q: What's right is what's left if you do everything else wrong.
h:
“What's right is what's left if you do everything else wrong.” —
Robin Williams

q: It's what you do in the present that will redeem the past and thereby change the future.
h:
“It's what you do in the present that will redeem the past and thereby change the future.” —
Paulo Coelho

q: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
h:
“Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.” —
John Wooden

q: The most wasted day of all is that on which we have not laughed.
h:
“The most wasted day of all is that on which we have not laughed.” —
Nicolas Chamfort

q: We must be free not because we claim freedom, but because we practice it.
h:
“We must be free not because we claim freedom, but because we practice it.” —
William Faulkner

q: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
h:
“Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.” —
Oscar Wilde

q: One's best success comes after their greatest disappointments.
h:
“One's best success comes after their greatest disappointments.” —
Henry Ward Beecher

q: One is never afraid of the unknown; one is afraid of the known coming to an end.
h:
“One is never afraid of the unknown; one is afraid of the known coming to an end.” —
Jiddu Krishnamurti

q: I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts or my thoughts the result of my dreams.
h:
“I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts or my thoughts the result of my dreams.” —
D. H. Lawrence

q: A man who acquires the ability to take full possession of his own mind may take possession of anything else to which he is justly entitled.
h:
“A man who acquires the ability to take full possession of his own mind may take possession of anything else to which he is justly entitled.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: Fear is your worst enemy. Risk is your best friend.
h:
“Fear is your worst enemy. Risk is your best friend.” —
Gurbaksh Chahal

q: It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.
h:
“It doesn't matter where you are, you are nowhere compared to where you can go.” —
Bob Proctor

q: Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.
h:
“Don't be afraid to go slowly. Be afraid of stopping.” —
Zen Proverb

q: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
h:
“Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: Health is the greatest of all possessions.
h:
“Health is the greatest of all possessions.” —
Jonathan Swift

q: The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it.
h:
“The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it. ” —
Genghis Khan

q: Don't set your own goals by what other people make important.
h:
“Don't set your own goals by what other people make important.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: Death walks faster than the wind and never returns what he has taken.
h:
“Death walks faster than the wind and never returns what he has taken.” —
Hans Christian Andersen

q: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
h:
“It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.” —
Albus Dumbledore

q: If you done it, it ain't bragging.
h:
“If you done it, it ain't bragging.” —
Walt Whitman

q: It ain't where you start in life, it's where you end up, and what you did along the way.
h:
“It ain't where you start in life, it's where you end up, and what you did along the way.” —
Colin Powell

q: When you know what you want, and you want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.
h:
“When you know what you want, and you want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it.” —
Jim Rohn

q: I'm an optimist by choice not by stupidity.
h:
“I'm an optimist by choice not by stupidity.” —
Yanni

q: Nature loves to hide.
h:
“Nature loves to hide.” —
Heraclitus

q: Far more crucial than what we know or do not know is what we do not want to know.
h:
“Far more crucial than what we know or do not know is what we do not want to know.” —
Eric Hoffer

q: The world doesn't owe you anything. It was here first.
h:
“The world doesn't owe you anything. It was here first.” —
Mark Twain

q: We may not be responsible for the world that created our minds, but we can take responsibility for the mind with which we create our world.
h:
“We may not be responsible for the world that created our minds, but we can take responsibility for the mind with which we create our world.” —
Gabor Mate

q: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
h:
“In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.” —
Thomas Jefferson

q: Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.
h:
“Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.” —
Dan Brown

q: He that can have patience can have what he will.
h:
“He that can have patience can have what he will.” —
Benjamin Franklin

q: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
h:
“Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.” —
Hans Christian Andersen

q: The only reason to be alive is to enjoy it.
h:
“The only reason to be alive is to enjoy it.” —
Rita Mae Brown

q: If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
h:
“If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.” —
Criss Jami

q: Where there is anger, there is always pain underneath.
h:
“Where there is anger, there is always pain underneath.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little; do something.
h:
“It is the greatest of all mistakes to do nothing because you can only do little; do something.” —
Sydney Smith

q: Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.
h:
“Change begets change. Nothing propagates so fast.” —
Charles Dickens

q: In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.
h:
“In the practice of tolerance, one's enemy is the best teacher.” —
Dalai Lama

q: No idea, no matter how good, will work if it doesn't get used.
h:
“No idea, no matter how good, will work if it doesn't get used.” —
Peter A. Cohen

q: If you've never eaten while crying you don t know what life tastes like.
h:
“If you've never eaten while crying you don t know what life tastes like.” —
Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

q: Nothing is easier than fault finding.
h:
“Nothing is easier than fault finding.” —
Og Mandino

q: Wheels of justice grind slow but grind fine.
h:
“Wheels of justice grind slow but grind fine.” —
Sun Tzu

q: Life is a gift. Never forget to enjoy and bask in every moment you are in.
h:
“Life is a gift. Never forget to enjoy and bask in every moment you are in.” —
Celestine Chua

q: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
h:
“Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.” —
Norman Vincent Peale

q: Doubt is an uncomfortable condition, but certainty is a ridiculous one.
h:
“Doubt is an uncomfortable condition, but certainty is a ridiculous one.” —
Voltaire

q: Life is about choice. You can choose to be a victim or anything else you like to be.
h:
“Life is about choice. You can choose to be a victim or anything else you like to be.” —
Celestine Chua

q: Good entrepreneurs don't fail because they stay at it.
h:
“Good entrepreneurs don't fail because they stay at it.” —
Naval Ravikant
